author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: مَا أَحْلَى إِشْرَاقَكَ مَنْ أُفُقِ المِيْثَاقِ بَيْنَ أَهْلِ النِّفَاقِ وَاشْتِيَاقَكَ بِاللهِ يَا عِشْقَ العَالَمِينَ *
translation: How sweet was Thy dawning on the horizon of the Covenant among the stirrers of sedition, and Thy yearning after God, O Love of the worlds.
